actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; International Trade Commission; Office of U.S. Trade Representative; Treasury Department; State Department; Commerce Department.

official_title: A bill to apply duty-free treatment to Fourdrinier wires suitable for use in capacitor papermaking machines.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to apply duty-free treatment to certain Fourdrinier wires suitable for use in capacitor papermaking machines.

titles.title: A bill to apply duty-free treatment to Fourdrinier wires suitable for use in capacitor papermaking machines.
